    • Method Detail

      • getFlags

        public static EnumSet<org.apache.solr.common.luke.FieldFlag> getFlags(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.LukeResponse.FieldInfo field)
        Extract flags from a Solr field. Because of a bug in SolrJ, FieldInfo.getFlags() may return null if the request was made by calling LukeRequest.setSchema(false). This method extracts the flags in all cases.
        Parameters:
        field - Solr field.
        Returns:
        List of flags.

      • getRemoteFields

        public static List<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.LukeResponse.FieldInfo> getRemoteFields()
                                                                                          throws SophieException
        Get list of instantiated fields from the remote Solr server. Dynamic fields are named according to how they are instantiated (e.g. dynamic_foobar).
        Returns:
        List of fields defined on the remote Solr server.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the remote fields cannot be fetched.

      • getRemoteSchemaFields

        public static Map<String,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.LukeResponse.FieldInfo> getRemoteSchemaFields()
                                                                                                      throws SophieException
        Get a list of declared fields from the remote Solr server. Dynamic fields are named according to how they are declared so may be globs (e.g. dynamic_*).
        Returns:
        Map of fields keyed by field name.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the remote fields cannot be fetched.

      • getRemoteUniqueField

        public static String getRemoteUniqueField(boolean cached)
                                   throws SophieException
        Get unique key field from the remote Solr server.
        Parameters:
        cached - If false, the value will be retrieved from Solr. If true, the value may be retrieved from a local cache.
        Returns:
        Unique key field name.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the unique key field cannot be fetched.

      • getRemoteUniqueField

        public static String getRemoteUniqueField()
                                   throws SophieException
        Get unique key field (possibly cached) from the remote Solr server.
        Returns:
        Unique key field name.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the unique key field cannot be fetched.

      • getCores

        public static Map<String,org.apache.solr.common.util.NamedList<Object>> getCores()
                                                                          throws SophieException
        Get list of cores from the remote Solr server.
        Returns:
        Map of cores attributes keyed by core name.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the list of cores cannot be fetched.

      • getSystemInfo

        public static org.apache.solr.common.util.NamedList<Object> getSystemInfo()
                                                                   throws SophieException
        Get Solr system info.
        Returns:
        Solr system info.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If Solr system info cannot be fetched.

      • getSystemProperties

        public static org.apache.solr.common.util.NamedList<Object> getSystemProperties()
                                                                         throws SophieException
        Get Solr system properties.
        Returns:
        Solr system properties.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If Solr system properties cannot be fetched.

      • isFieldSortable

        public static boolean isFieldSortable(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.LukeResponse.FieldInfo field)
        Whether Solr can sort a field.
        Parameters:
        field - Field.
        Returns:
        True if Solr can sort the field, false otherwise.
